Method Detail

authenticate

public void authenticate(java.lang.String userID,
                         java.lang.String orgID,
                         java.lang.String userPassword,
                         boolean shallThrowException)
                  throws UPMException
Authenticate user during application login. Throws exception if fails.
Throws:
UPMException - ERR_WRONG_UID_PSWD if wrong userID/orgID/password. ERR_USER_SUSPENDED if login success but suspended.
